properties.installFolderPath: {{ '/' | path_join: properties.cwd | path_join: 'lib' | path_join: 'binding' | path_join: properties.platformId }}
properties.configNative: {% ifNpmOption standalone_build %}native-xpack{% endifNpmOption %}{% unlessNpmOption standalone_build %}native{% endunlessNpmOption %}
properties.scriptInstallNative: npx prebuild-install -d {{ properties.verbose }} || ( npx xpm install && npx xpm install --config {{ properties.configNative }} && xpm run prepare --config {{ properties.configNative }} && xpm run build --config {{ properties.configNative }} )
properties.scriptInstallWASM: npx prebuild-install --platform emscripten --arch wasm32 -d {{ properties.verbose }} || ( npx xpm install && xpm run prepare --config wasm && xpm run build --config wasm )
